Articles.Content:
I went a did a search but couldn't find what I wanted on the topic. I see that there's a UI Scale option in the settings, but I don't see a change to the UI size. Mainly the UI is fine but I find the font size on the delta-v and TWR readouts  and the bars in the stages is super tiny and I want to increase it. I've tried sliding it up and down in game and before load but I'm not seeing any changes. 

edit: I did find that it's working for the in-flight UI, but it would be nice to have global scaling.

Edited January 3 by FraggedLocust
